OpenLink Project

The web application we want to develop would make it possible to establish a logical link between the various media used by the research teams. To us, it seems to be a primary need to assist the researchers with the monitoring and the enrichment of the metadata throughout the data lifecycle.
In parallel, the development of a methodology in the monitoring of projects will aim to support the research teams to show them the added value of developing a data management plan from the beginning of a project, raise awareness of data storage management costs and train them in the FAIR principles.
